query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: DECIDO Portal Beta version
result.description: This deliverable describes the technological solutions adopted for the realization of DECIDO Portal from T3.3 (IR3.1), and how the identified tools and services have been integrated in T3.4 and T3.5 (IR3.2). It will also consist of a prototype of the whole DECIDO ICT Environment.

category.title: Topic

result.title: Pilot's execution report - v2
result.description: Report on the pilot operation, execution and generated outputs, including applied dashboards, indicator systems, simulations and reports for each pilot consolidating the input of Tasks 4.1-4.5 (IR4.1, IR4.2, IR4.3, IR4.4, IR4.5). This version of the deliverable will focus on how the pilots improve policy making processes through the DECIDO ICT Environment. The report will also provide information on the technical support provided, technical barriers encountered and lessons learned.

programme.title: SOCIETAL CHALLENGES - Europe In A Changing World - Inclusive, Innovative And Reflective Societies

category.title: Legal Basis
category.description: Programme: Legal basis for research funding

result.title: 28 case study reports (two case studies per country): a) on re-search capability and quality (14) and b) on critical junctures of media development (14).
result.description: The aim of the 28 case study reports (two case studies per country) is: a) to provide analysis on research capability and quality concerning ROs. The case studies elaborate each domain of ROs concerning the quality of the data and knowledge; the main knowledge gaps concerning national research; national research capability; position of research and data collection units; potential for international co-operation. b) provide descriptions on critical junctures of media development in the 21st century (14). Each country team will develop a country case study on critical junctures in the transformation processes in four domains of ROs. National case studies include background chapter concerning social and political changes if these changes produce ROs, and a special sub-chapter on the agency of different actors in propelling certain ROs. These case studies will use previous research results as well as conduct expert interviews with key actors in media industry, politicians, experts on statistics etc.
